        public RectangleShape createABoss(int a,
                                  int b,
                                  int x,
                                  int y)
        Creates a boss using given parameters
        Parameters:
        a - width
        b - height
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        boss representation without any texture

      • checkIfWon

        public boolean checkIfWon()
        Getter if the victory has been achieved
        Returns:
        true = victory || false = game has not been won yet

      • getHurt

        public boolean getHurt()
        Getter of the state hurting
        Returns:
        true = boss is getting hurt || false = boss is not hurting

      • getShooting

        public abstract boolean getShooting()
        Abstract getter of the shooting state
        Returns:
        true = currently shooting || false = currently not shooting
